Account.disconnectText: This will remove the ability to login via Discord.
Account.disabledDisconnectText: You cannot disconnect your Discord connection when 'Disallow regular login' is enabled. To delete your account please contact an administrator
Account.connectText: This will add the ability to login via Discord.
Account.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code to add it to your authenticator app
Account.verifyCode: Verify by entering a code from your authenticator app
